name: Loopy Birds - Connect & Pop
description:
Connect the crazy birds together! Form linking loops and squares to complete clever puzzles!
Loopy Birds will have you building your brain to solve challenging and innovative puzzles one loop at a time!

Features:

• FREE to play!
• CONNECT one bird to another, grab treasures, make a line, create bombs, fight fire, and much more in this fun free puzzle game
• ADVENTURE through hundreds of fun and addicting levels
• ADORABLE fun, and thoughtful game design in this beautiful game about connecting
• ENJOY beautiful and crazy birds with relaxing game music and fun sound fx
• PLAY at your own pace to figure out the perfect move without having to worry about the old time clock
• CHALLENGE your friends to pass your level on Facebook, beat their scores, and earn bragging rights
• MAKE a square or a loop, to combo every bird of a single color!

DOWNLOAD AND LINK THEM TODAY!
